name: WRUI Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A WRUI file is a file that has been encrypted by WRUI ransomware , which is malware distributed by cybercriminals. It contains a file, such as an .MP4 , .JPG , or .DOCX file, that the virus has renamed and encrypted. WRUI files cannot be opened, and they cannot be decrypted.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
